document_data.name: Kordak
document_data.mainbody: '''Kordak''' was an evil mage during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Kordak was selfish, bloodthirsty, and deceitful.
document_data.Abilities: As a wizard he knew a number of spells: ''[[charm person]], [[magic missile]], [[stinking cloud]], [[shield]], [[invisibility]]''. Notably, none of those spells controlled undead. He was also slighly better defended than one would expect, presumably due to fairly good agility.
document_data.Possessions: He had a sack with 1,500 [[silver piece]]s and an ''[[ioun stone]]'' that improved his physical defenses, presumably a ''dusty rose prism''.
document_data.Activities: As of the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], he was trying to set up a secret hideout.
document_data.Relationships: He had two [[zombie]] servants and a pet [[snake]].
document_data.History: In the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], Kordak was in a dilapidated tower within the caverns of [[Mount Dread]], where he tried to set up a secret hideout. If adventurers came across him, he may have tried to ''charm'' one of them into helping with a nearby ''black bear'', then ambush them with his zombie underlings and magic after they succeeded, or should they refuse.
